'''''Hiiragi Sanjuuro''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[Ritou Escape Plan]].''

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement is a combined reference to the [[Hiiragi Clan]] and {{w|Akira Kurosawa}}'s 1962 film {{Lang|''{{w|Sanjuro}}''|ja=椿三十郎|ja_rm=Tsubaki Sanjuurou}}.
